p: The study aim and significance were explained to the participants prior to data collection, and the interviews were scheduled at the participants' convenience. The data collection process was an iterative process that included collecting, coding, and analyzing data ( 13). The interviews were conducted by the research team members, most of whom had previous experience conducting qualitative interviews. One-on-one interviews were held through the software application Zoom, and all interviews were recorded and kept strictly private and confidential.
